comment.brief:
Asynchronously reads a file from the application bundle and writes it to a destination on the device.
Use with `FuseJS/FileSystem` to determine destination paths. This is useful for extracting html and associated content for local use with WebView via `file://` protocol.

returns.text: A promise of the path the file was written to (echo)

parameters.name: bundleFilePath
parameters.description: The path of the bundled file to read (ie 'assets/image.jpg')

parameters.name: destinationPath
parameters.description: The absolute path to write the file to (ie 'c:/someDirectory/image.jpg')
